member.summary: Human-readable description of the tank

member.summary: Describes the accessory type: FishTank is the default type for this class

member.summary: Describes the capacity of the tank in gallons

member.name: P:AquaModClasses.BaseClassModels.FishTank.pHLevel
member.summary: Potential Hydrogen (pH) - Measures level of relative acidity to other substances based on the amount of hydrogen

member.name: P:AquaModClasses.BaseClassModels.FishTank.NitriteLevel
member.summary: Nitrite - Measures levels of Ammonia in water, toxic to fish in large amounts

member.name: P:AquaModClasses.BaseClassModels.FishTank.NitrateLevel
member.summary: Nitrate - Measures levels of Ammonia in water

member.name: P:AquaModClasses.BaseClassModels.FishTank.CarbonateHardnessLevel
member.summary: Carbonate Hardness - Measures Alkalinity - Combination of measures of Carbonate and Bicarbonate. Helps to stabalize pH.

member.name: P:AquaModClasses.BaseClassModels.FishTank.GeneralHardnessLevel
member.summary: General Hardness - Overall measure of the concentration of calcium, magnesium, and other ions in water. Measured in degree where 1 = 17.9mg/l.

member.summary: Represents a list of Tank tests that have been performed

member.name: T:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishBirthType
member.summary: Represents the method of giving birth for the fish

member.summary: Fish gives birth to live fry

member.summary: Fish lays eggs and then those eggs hatch

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishBirthType.OTHER
member.summary: Any method of birth excluding live bearing and egg laying

member.name: T:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishFeederType
member.summary: Represents what feeding category of fish

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishFeederType.BOTTOM_FEEDER
member.summary: Algae eater, janitors of the tank

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishFeederType.NORMAL_FEEDER
member.summary: Eat flaked food like a normal fish

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishFeederType.CARNIVEROUS
member.summary: Eats other fish or some form of live meat food.

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishFeederType.OTHER_FEEDER
member.summary: Other Feeder types, plants consume light for example

member.name: T:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishSocialTemperament
member.summary: Describes the type of communityism associated with the fish

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishSocialTemperament.COMMUNITY
member.summary: Fish is good with all other types

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishSocialTemperament.SEMI_TERRITORIAL
member.summary: Fish may be territorial with its own kind, but ok with everyone else

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishSocialTemperament.TERRITORIAL
member.summary: Fish may be territorial to all other fish

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishSocialTemperament.TERRITORIAL_SINGLE_MALE
member.summary: Tank should only contain ONE male, as many females as desired

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishSocialTemperament.TERRITORIAL_SINGLE_FEMALE
member.summary: Tank should only contain ONE female, as many males as desired

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishSocialTemperament.TERRITORIAL_SINGLE
member.summary: Tank should contain ONLY THIS ONE fish, can be either male or female

member.name: T:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishTemperament
member.summary: Determines whether the fish is peaceful or agressive

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishTemperament.PEACEFUL
member.summary: Peaceful - Perfect Community Fish

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishTemperament.SEMI_AGRESSIVE
member.summary: Semi-Agressive - Fish may be agressive to its own kind or if bothered

member.name: F:AquaModClasses.FishProperties.FishTemperament.AGRESSIVE
member.summary: Agressive - Fish will actively seek out fights, and/or bully other fish
